key_risks: Dependence on tourism and sensitivity to global travel trends
Regulatory risks from changes in VAT refund policies or currency conversion regulations
Increasing competition from fintech startups and payment solution providers
Fraud and data security risks impacting customer trust
Exposure to economic downturns affecting consumer spending and international travel
social_issues: Data privacy concerns and adherence to global standards
